query: Find all countries with Poliovirus that have at least 1 environmental sample that came back positive and with at least 1 positive confirmed case

_meta.description: List of countries potentially affected by Poliovirus
Analysis results for countries meeting both criteria: positive environmental sample and positive confirmed case

data.description: "Countries identified as having high risk for poliovirus transmission and targeted for intensified surveillance and eradication activities."<SEP>"Countries identified as high risk for poliovirus transmission and targeted for enhanced surveillance and immunization activities."<SEP>"Countries selected for polio surveillance based on endemic transmission, detection of cVDPV isolates, or high programmatic risk. Includes countries from African, Eastern Mediterranean, European, South-East Asia, and Western Pacific regions."<SEP>"Priority countries are those identified as needing enhanced surveillance and eradication activities for polio, with noted declines in NPAFP rates and stool adequacy."

"A priority country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region, experienced an increase in cVDPV2 cases from 22 to 135 between 2019 and 2020."<SEP>"Country where cVDPV2 and WPV1 were detected through environmental surveillance and genetic clustering."<SEP>"Pakistan is a country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region where WPV1 and orphan isolates were detected in 2019 and 2020."<SEP>"Pakistan is a country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region. Surveillance data for 2020 includes AFP and cVDPV indicators."<SEP>"Pakistan is a country included in the dataset, with extensive health surveillance data."<SEP>"Pakistan is a country where progress toward poliomyelitis eradication was specifically studied between January 2019 and September 2020."<SEP>"Pakistan is one of two countries where wild poliovirus type 1 transmission remains endemic."

"A priority country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region, experienced an increase in cVDPV2 cases from none to 308 between 2019 and 2020."<SEP>"Afghanistan is a country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region where WPV1 and orphan isolates were detected in 2019 and 2020."<SEP>"Afghanistan is a country in the WHO Eastern Mediterranean Region. history.command: DECLARE polio_country_candidates AS LIST WITH_DESCRIPTION "List of countries potentially affected by Poliovirus"

extraction.description: List of countries potentially affected by Poliovirus

history.command: DECLARE country_analysis AS DICT WITH_DESCRIPTION "Analysis results for countries meeting both criteria: positive environmental sample and positive confirmed case"

extraction.description: Analysis results for countries meeting both criteria: positive environmental sample and positive confirmed case

history.command: FIND nodes with entity_type=COUNTRY AS country_nodes

PROCESS country_nodes with instruction: filter to only those countries associated with Poliovirus, at least one positive environmental sample, and at least one positive confirmed case AS polio_country_candidates
PROCESS polio_country_candidates with instruction: for each country, extract and summarize evidence of positive environmental samples and positive confirmed cases AS country_analysis
